Harvest Season is coming!

Help the squirrels get ready for winter in the idle tycoon.

Challenge yourself with time leaderboards.

title: Harvest Season

creator: Dopamine Surfers
descriptionHtml:
Welcome to Harvest Season!

Immerse yourself in a calming idle game where you get to help squirrels gather acorns.

Hire hundreds of squirrel-gatherers who will collect acorns at an incredible speed in a mesmerizing dance! But it won't be so simple - hundreds of squirrels might get confused in the queue for the tree, so it's better to hire squirrel-supervisors to aid them.

Over time, one tree for gathering will not be enough. Of course, it's best if a squirrel-forester watches over the trees. We don't want the squirrels to be bored during the harvest, do we? Let's please them by planting gorgeous flower beds along the paths! Happy squirrels might even be able to gather more acorns at a time. To make the squirrels even happier, you can hire a bard who will brighten up their routine with his lively songs! Perhaps he will even throw a party?

Let each squirrel feel special and rejoice in all these benefits. You can view the happiness of each squirrel on a special screen. A squirrel's happiness influences how quickly it can level up.

There's also a special squirrel available for you - an assistant. He can keep an eye on the harvest in your absence, as well as help you gather golden acorns. This will please any fan of automation in idle games.

Simple quests and daily tasks will help you master the basic game mechanics, and you can get nice bonuses for them. The game is session-based. This is not an endless idle clicker that's easier to abandon than wait to accumulate millions or billions of coins. After each session, you will be offered one of 7 game modes for the next session. Can you complete all the game modes?

Features:

- Calming casual gameplay
- Hundreds of squirrels on a screen!
- Diverse progression mechanics
- A variety of different game modes
- No wifi or other internet connection required
- Various quests
title: Harvest Season
